entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
